channel.title: Projects | Big AI Dream | Jie Fu

item.title: Drug-Target Interaction
item.description: I’m working on drug-target interaction prediction projects, which can be used to screen potential drugs. I’m adapting tools from NLP community, e.g. language models. Wil share results soon.

item.title: Protein Remote Homology Detection
item.description: I’m working on protein remote homology detection projects. I’m adapting tools from IR community. Wil share results soon.

item.title: Meta RL
item.description:
Sample efficiency is key to the real-world application of RL. That is we wish to minimize the interactions between the RL and the environment.

Right now, I’m working on meta RL projects. Wil share results soon.
